title: Lesson Learned: Migration Prefix Realignment
description: Automating migration prefix realignment prevents conflicts and ensures smooth migration workflows.

guidelines.title: Always use automation for migration prefix realignment.
guidelines.description: Manual renaming is error-prone and can lead to migration conflicts.

lessons.title: Prefix conflicts are a common source of migration errors.
lessons.description: Automated tools can resolve these quickly and reliably.

insights.title: FORCE Orchestration
insights.description: Integrating prefix realignment as a FORCE tool and pattern enables repeatable, auditable, and error-free migration management.
